Articles.Content:
Hello,

I recently found the FlightEvent class in KSP api,

And know i have a question, how to get event of active vessel ?

I mean, i want tp check if the FlightEvent.OUTOFFUEL is true for my active vessel.

Any idea ? Thank in advance

Creekorful

Moved to Plugin development, where questions about code reside.

I believe that works via GameEvents, I'd suggest looking there.

Indeed, those state are sent with GameEvent. You need to subscribe to the event you want. ( [http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/API:GameEvents](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/API:GameEvents) )

If you have more question post. You can also PM me in French if you want.
